snippet: With the Major League Baseball playoffs finally set, Washington could be forced to make a tough choice in 2012, but not the one everyone has been talking about for the past 18 months.
abstract: With the Major League Baseball playoffs finally set, Washington could be forced to make a tough choice in 2012, but not the one everyone has been talking about for the past 18 months.
lead_paragraph: With the Major League Baseball playoffs finally set, Washington could be forced to make a tough choice in 2012, but not the one everyone has been talking about for the past 18 months. Read the post at The Caucus blog.

headline.main: D.C. May Have to Decide Between Pastimes
